Package ca.concordia.risk.game.strategies

Class AggressiveStrategy

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.risk.game.strategies.PlayerStrategy
ca.concordia.risk.game.strategies.AggressiveStrategy
public class AggressiveStrategy
extends PlayerStrategy
This class represents the aggressive player strategy.

A Player that concentrates all his armies into one country and attack!

  • Constructor Details

    • AggressiveStrategy

      public AggressiveStrategy​(Player p_player)
      Creates a new aggressive strategy.
      Parameters:
      p_player - player using this strategy to set as context.

  • Method Details

    • issueOrder

      public Order issueOrder()
      Issues one player order.

      Aggressive behavior for issuing orders. - Find the country with your armies and deploy all armies in it. - Find the nearest enemy with a BFS approach. - Either attack an enemy or start advancing towards one.

      Specified by:
      issueOrder in class PlayerStrategy
      Returns:
      an Order object if an order was issued.
      null if no valid order was issued.

    • findEnemy

      public Country findEnemy​(Country p_fromCountry)
      Populate d_backtrack with a BFS approach, until finding an enemy.
      Parameters:
      p_fromCountry - Current country to trace a path to an enemy country.
      Returns:
      Enemy Country to advance towards

    • buildPath

      public void buildPath​(Country p_enemy)
      Populate d_path walking back in d_backtrack from the target enemy until the current source country.
      Parameters:
      p_enemy - Enemy Country to trace a path to.
